TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ThreeDFormat

summary.span: 代表形状的三维格式。

span.span: Represents a shape's three-dimensional formatting.

span.para: 使用属性返回ThreeDFormat对象。
不能应用到某些类型的形状，例如多重分段的路径或凹凸效果的形状的三维格式。大部分属性和方法的ThreeDFormat对象的此类形状将失败。
Use the property to return a ThreeDFormat object.

You cannot apply three-dimensional formatting to some kinds of shapes, such as beveled shapes or multiple-disjoint paths. Most of the properties and methods of the ThreeDFormat object for such a shape will fail.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回对象代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float ContourWidth { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 一个 值，表示形状的轮廓线的宽度。读/写。

span.span: Returns or sets a Single that represents the width of the contour of a shape. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果 Microsoft Word 中创建对象，此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Depth { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置该形状的延伸深度。

span.span: Returns or sets the depth of the shape's extrusion.

summary.span: 可以是介于 – 600 到 9600 （正值产生其正面是原始形状的延伸; 负值产生其背面是原始形状的延伸）。

span.span: Can be a value from – 600 through 9600 (positive values produce an extrusion whose front face is the original shape; negative values produce an extrusion whose back face is the original shape).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExtrusionColor As ColorFormat

summary.span: 返回对象，表示形状的延伸部分的颜色。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the color of the shape's extrusion.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoExtrusionColorType ExtrusionColorType { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoExtrusionColorType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoExtrusionColorType value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个值，该值指示延伸区域的颜色是否基于延伸的形状的填充 (延伸区域的正面) 和自动更改形状的填充更改，或延伸颜色是否独立于形状的填充。

span.span: Returns or sets a value that indicates whether the extrusion color is based on the extruded shape's fill (the front face of the extrusion) and automatically changes when the shape's fill changes, or whether the extrusion color is independent of the shape's fill.

span.para: 可以是下列MsoExtrusionColorType常量之一：
msoExtrusionColorAutomatic – 延伸颜色基于图形填充。
msoExtrusionColorCustom – 延伸颜色独立于图形填充。
can be one of these MsoExtrusionColorType constants:
msoExtrusionColorAutomatic – Extrusion color based on shape fill.
msoExtrusionColorCustom – Extrusion color independent of shape fill.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float FieldOfView { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 一个 表示的形状的角度来看。读/写。

span.span: Returns or sets a Single that represents the amount of perspective for a shape. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void IncrementRotationHorizontal([in]float32 Increment) runtime managed

span.span: Specifies the incrementation value.

summary.span: 水平旋转的形状使用指定的增量值 x 轴上。

span.span: Horizontally rotates a shape on the x-axis using the specified incrementation value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void IncrementRotationVertical([in]float32 Increment) runtime managed

span.span: Specifies the incrementation value.

summary.span: 垂直旋转一个形状使用指定的增量值在 y 轴上。

span.span: Vertically rotates a shape on the y-axis using the specified incrementation value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void IncrementRotationX([in]float32 Increment) runtime managed

param.name: Increment

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 指定形状绕 x 轴的旋转角度更改量 （以度）。

span.span: Specifies how much (in degrees) the rotation of the shape around the x-axis is to be changed.

param.span: 可以是介于 – 90 至 90 之间的值。

span.span: Can be a value from –90 through 90.

param.span: 正值将形状倾斜负值将它倾斜下。

span.span: A positive value tilts the shape up; a negative value tilts it down.

summary.span: 按指定度数值，改变指定图形绕 X 轴的旋转度。

span.span: Changes the rotation of the specified shape around the x-axis by the specified number of degrees.

remarks.span:
使用属性设置形状绕 x 轴的绝对旋转角度。
您不能调整RotationX属性 （90 度为 – 90 度） 的上半部分还是下半限制指定形状绕 x 轴旋转角度。例如，如果RotationX属性最初设置为 80 和指定的 40参数，生成旋转将 90 （ RotationX属性的上限） 而不是 120。更改形状绕 y 轴的旋转，请使用
方法。若要更改绕 z 轴的旋转角度，请使用方法。

span.para: Use the property to set the absolute rotation of the shape around the x-axis.

You cannot adjust the rotation around the x-axis of the specified shape past the upper or lower limit for the RotationX property (90 degrees to –90 degrees). For example, if the RotationX property is initially set to 80 and you specify 40 for the argument, the resulting rotation will be 90 (the upper limit for the RotationX property) instead of 120.
To change the rotation of a shape around the y-axis, use the method. To change the rotation around the z-axis, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void IncrementRotationY([in]float32 Increment) runtime managed

param.name: Increment

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 指定形状绕 y 轴的旋转角度更改量 （以度）。

span.span: Specifies how much (in degrees) the rotation of the shape around the y-axis is to be changed.

param.span: 可以是介于 – 90 至 90 值。

span.span: Can be a value from – 90 through 90.

param.span: 正值将向左; 形状倾斜负值将它倾斜至右侧。

span.span: A positive value tilts the shape to the left; a negative value tilts it to the right.

summary.span: 按指定的度数值，改变指定图形绕 Y 轴的旋转量。

span.span: Changes the rotation of the specified shape around the y-axis by the specified number of degrees.

remarks.span:
使用属性设置形状绕 y 轴的绝对旋转角度。更改形状绕 x 轴的旋转，请使用
方法。若要更改绕 z 轴的旋转角度，请使用方法。
您不能调整RotationY属性 （90 度为 – 90 度） 的上半部分还是下半限制指定形状绕 y 轴旋转角度。例如，如果RotationY属性最初设置为 80 和指定的 40参数，生成旋转将 90 （ RotationY属性的上限） 而不是 120。

span.para: Use the property to set the absolute rotation of the shape around the y-axis.
To change the rotation of a shape around the x-axis, use the method. To change the rotation around the z-axis, use the method.

You cannot adjust the rotation around the y-axis of the specified shape past the upper or lower limit for the RotationY property (90 degrees to – 90 degrees). For example, if the RotationY property is initially set to 80 and you specify 40 for the argument, the resulting rotation will be 90 (the upper limit for the RotationY property) instead of 120.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void IncrementRotationZ([in]float32 Increment) runtime managed

span.span: Specifies the incrementation value.

summary.span: 按照指定的增量在 z 轴上旋转一个形状。

span.span: Rotates a shape on the z-axis using the specified incrementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState Perspective { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState value); };

summary.span: MsoTrue如果以透视效果显示延伸，即延伸部分的外壁向消失点收敛。

span.span: MsoTrue if the extrusion appears in perspective— that is, if the walls of the extrusion narrow toward a vanishing point.

summary.span: MsoFalse如果延伸是平行或正交投影 — 即，如果背景墙不会伸向消失点收敛。

span.span: MsoFalse if the extrusion is a parallel, or orthographic, projection— that is, if the walls don't narrow toward a vanishing point.

span.para: 可以是下列MsoTriState常量之一：
can be one of these MsoTriState constants:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PresetThreeDFormat As MsoPresetThreeDFormat

summary.span: 返回预设的延伸格式。

span.span: Returns the preset extrusion format.

span.para: 每个预设的延伸格式都包含一组预设延伸的各个属性的值。如果延伸使用自定义格式而不是预设的格式，该属性返回msoPresetThreeDFormatMixed。
可以是下列MsoPresetThreeDFormat常量之一：
此属性的值对应于单击 Drawing 工具栏上的 3-D 按钮时显示的选项 （编号从左到右，靠上向下）。
使用方法，以便设置预设的延伸格式。

Each preset extrusion format contains a set of preset values for the various properties of the extrusion. If the extrusion has a custom format rather than a preset format, this property returns msoPresetThreeDFormatMixed.
can be one of these MsoPresetThreeDFormat constants:
The values for this property correspond to the options (numbered from left to right, top to bottom) displayed when you click the 3-D button on the Drawing toolbar.
Use the method to set the preset extrusion format.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState ProjectText { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置常量值，该值代表是否随形状旋转形状上的文本。

span.span: Returns or sets an constant that represents whether text on a shape rotates with shape.

summary.span: 旋转文本。

span.span: rotates the text.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetRotation() runtime managed

summary.span: 将延伸部分的 X 轴和 Y 轴的旋转量重新设置为 0，以使延伸部分的正面向前。此方法不重新设置绕 Z 轴的旋转量。

span.span: Resets the extrusion rotation around the x-axis and the y-axis to 0 (zero) so that the front of the extrusion faces forward. This method doesn't reset the rotation around the z-axis.

span.para: 若要设置延伸绕 x 轴和 y 轴的旋转为非 0 （零），使用和ThreeDFormat 对象的属性。若要设置延伸绕 z 轴的旋转，请使用属性对象，代表延伸的形状。

To set the extrusion rotation around the x-axis and the y-axis to anything other than 0 (zero), use the and properties of the ThreeDFormat object. To set the extrusion rotation around the z-axis, use the property of the object that represents the extruded shape.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RotationX { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置延伸形状绕 x 轴的旋转角度，以度为单位。

span.span: Returns or sets the rotation of the extruded shape around the x-axis in degrees.

summary.span: 可以是介于 – 90 至 90 值。

span.span: Can be a value from – 90 through 90.

summary.span: 正值表示向上旋转;负值表示向下旋转。

span.span: A positive value indicates upward rotation; a negative value indicates downward rotation.

span.para: 若要设置延伸形状绕 y 轴的旋转，请使用ThreeDFormat对象的属性。若要设置延伸形状绕 z 轴的旋转，请使用属性对象。若要更改的路径偏离延伸方向而不旋转延伸的正面，请使用方法。

To set the rotation of the extruded shape around the y-axis, use the property of the ThreeDFormat object. To set the rotation of the extruded shape around the z-axis, use the property of the object. To change the direction of the extrusion's sweep path without rotating the front face of the extrusion, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RotationY { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置延伸形状绕 y 轴的旋转角度，以度为单位。

span.span: Returns or sets the rotation of the extruded shape around the y-axis, in degrees.

summary.span: 可以是介于 – 90 至 90 值。

span.span: Can be a value from – 90 through 90.

summary.span: 正值表示向左; 旋转负值表示向右旋转。

span.span: A positive value indicates rotation to the left; a negative value indicates rotation to the right.

span.para: 若要设置延伸形状绕 x 轴的旋转，请使用ThreeDFormat对象的属性。若要设置延伸形状绕 z 轴的旋转，请使用属性对象。若要更改的路径偏离延伸方向而不旋转延伸的正面，请使用方法。

To set the rotation of the extruded shape around the x-axis, use the property of the ThreeDFormat object. To set the rotation of the extruded shape around the z-axis, use the property of the object. To change the direction of the extrusion's sweep path without rotating the front face of the extrusion, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RotationZ { float get(); void set(float value); };

span.span: Returns or sets a Single that represents z-axis rotation of the camera. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetExtrusionDirection([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetExtrusionDirection PresetExtrusionDirection) runtime managed

param.name: PresetExtrusionDirection
param.span: 所需。可以是下列MsoPresetExtrusionDirection常量之一： msoExtrusionTop msoExtrusionTopRight msoExtrusionBottom msoExtrusionBottomLeft msoExtrusionBottomRight msoExtrusionLeftmsoExtrusionNone msoExtrusionRight msoExtrusionTopLeft msoPresetExtrusionDirectionMixed

span.span: Required .Can be one of these MsoPresetExtrusionDirection constants: msoExtrusionTop msoExtrusionTopRight msoExtrusionBottom msoExtrusionBottomLeft msoExtrusionBottomRight msoExtrusionLeft msoExtrusionNone msoExtrusionRight msoExtrusionTopLeft msoPresetExtrusionDirectionMixed

summary.span: 设置延伸经过的路径偏离延伸形状的方向。

span.span: Sets the direction that the extrusion's sweep path takes away from the extruded shape.

span.para: 此方法设置属性设为由指定的方向为参数。
This method sets the property to the direction specified by the argument.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetThreeDFormat([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoPresetThreeDFormat PresetThreeDFormat) runtime managed

param.name: PresetThreeDFormat

span.span: Required .

param.span: 指定预设的延伸格式对应于单击 Drawing 工具栏上的 3-D 按钮时显示的选项 （编号从左到右，靠上向下） 之一。可以是下列MsoPresetThreeDFormat常量之一。

span.span: Specifies a preset extrusion format that corresponds to one of the options (numbered from left to right, top to bottom) displayed when you click the 3-D button on the Drawing toolbar.Can be one of these MsoPresetThreeDFormat constants.

param.span: 请注意，指定msopresetthreedformatmixed 给此参数会导致出错。

span.span: Note that specifying msoPresetThreeDFormatMixed for this argument causes an error.

summary.span: 返回预设的延伸格式。每个预设的延伸格式都包含一组各种延伸属性的预设值。

span.span: Sets the preset extrusion format. Each preset extrusion format contains a set of preset values for the various properties of the extrusion.

span.para: 此方法设置属性设为所指定的格式参数。
This method sets the property to the format specified by the argument.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState Visible { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState value); };

summary.span: 如果指定的对象或应用的格式，，是可见的 则返回 true 。

span.span: True if the specified object, or the formatting applied to it, is visible.

span.para: 可以是下列MsoTriState常量之一：
某些方法和属性可能不可用如果Visible属性为False。
can be one of these MsoTriState constants:
Some methods and properties may be unavailable if the Visible property is False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Z { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 一个 值，表示形状的 z 轴。读/写。

span.span: Returns or sets a Single that represents the z-axis for the shape. Read/write.
